title: Su Wan’s Secret Love - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Story   Female Protagonist   Modern Day   Oneshot
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
Su Wan has always had a crush on that one boy, Li Chengran. In the last year of high school, Su Wan confesses to him, but Li Chengran continues to remain aloof, shattering all of Su Wan’s hopes. But, she still cannot let go.

Later in the summer, Su Wan and Li Chengran’s relationship spark~ How will our cute bunny, Su Wan, face our male lead, Li Chengran in the end?>
